Name: Bishop's Gate
Notes: The eastern gateway into Cathedral Close

Name: St Annes Gate
Notes: Originally a residence and gateway, now only partly residential but still a gateway.

Name: Church of St. Lawrence
Date: Early C13 chancel but consecration recorded for 1326.
Notes: Parish Church of the village of Stratford sub Castle

Name: Church of St Martin
Place: St Martin's Church St., Salisbury. SP1 2HY
Notes: Originally a Saxon church, several restorations.

Name: Church of St Thomas and St Edmund
John Halle's Hall
Notes: Originally residential, now entrance to Odeon cinema.

Name: The King's Arms
Notes: Probably residential initially, later and now, an inn.

Name: The Old George Inn
Notes: This old inn has a number of literary and historical connections, now, with ground floor removed, entrance to shopping mall. No longer an inn.
